title: Please help? "Unspecified Error Occurred. Please check the logs for more information."
body:
I've always had problems opening LoL. Once it took an entire day to update the patcher and another time I had to do overnight. I'm not an internet/technology expert so I have no idea what happens, my internet's never been bad, but it's always been LoL that's so hard to update. But now I can't even open it without the LoL logo appearing for a few seconds, and then "Unspecified Error Occurred. Please check the logs for more information" appearing. I've repeatedly tried to open it again and again and once in a while it says "Another instance of the program is running. Do you want to terminate it?" but the same result happens every time. I've researched everywhere but nOthing helps.

A few things about my laptop/wi-fi (idk if it's relevant but it might be):
- It's a MacBook Air.
- My wi-fi recently turned off for like a week, but yesterday it turned on again :)
- Some friends recently played LoL on my laptop and maybe they did something to the program or something idk.
- **IT'S SO ANNOYING.**

Please answer and help.

EDIT: yay I just waited and it worked :)

replies.body: MAC FIX: (worked for me), go to league of legends app files, go to RADS folder and delete solutions folder within. Then restart mac and lol launches like normal

This worked for me. I didn't have this problem until today but this fixed it fast.

Thank you!
I cannot log in either. My game crashed mid game in the middle of a previsionary ranked match. This is so annoying. Please fix this riot
damn sorry. i just waited and its now working :)
Windows 8 here, getting rads error too.

> [{quoted}](name=Dark Lord Sauron,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=E7zZwNyk,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-09T09:37:44.536+0000)
>
> Windows 8 here, getting rads error too.

try deleting pando media booster or if you updated to windowa 8 or 8.1 run your lol client on windows 7 fised my issues
I've deleted pando media booster, Ill try running in windows 7. Thanks.

ok


turns out im not the only one 

im mac btw
same, there are plenty of posts about server issues and rads problems yeah, maybe there's a solution there
also guys alot of posts in the boards about server issues rads problems so follow the boards and hopefully riot will fix seems to be only affecting some ppl though
disregard my noobishness XD i dont use mac XD

when i updated to windows 8 lol stopped working i could never get lol working with windows 8 so just run lol with windows 7 and never have any problems  . . . . if thats not it try deleting  "pando media booster" from your computer and that might help hope i helped you guys
i have a macbook pro and the exact same thing is happening.. its very annoying but then it could be because of some people getting skins while others didn't...
oh okay thanks :) i'll check tomorrow morning lmao ...
